meanings.definition: A covering made of fabric that is slipped over an existing piece of furniture to protect it or give it a new look.
meanings.sent1: The slipcovering on the sofa kept it clean and stylish.
meanings.sent2: She bought a slipcovering for her old armchair to match the new curtains.
meanings.sent3: The slipcovering on the recliner made it look like a fancy throne.
meanings.sent4: Her slipcovering transformed the worn-out couch into a cozy retreat.
meanings.sent5: The slipcovering, like a magic cloak, refreshed the appearance of the chair.

meanings.definition: The act of putting a slipcover on furniture.
meanings.sent1: After some practice, slipcovering became an easy task for her.
meanings.sent2: He learned the art of slipcovering from his grandmother.
meanings.sent3: The slipcovering process turned into a fun DIY project for the family.
meanings.sent4: With precision and care, slipcovering can give furniture a whole new vibe.
meanings.sent5: The slipcovering ritual brought a sense of renewal to the room.
